Reverse! The game now goes in the opposite direction

Medusa! Everyone looks down. On 3, look up. If you make eye contact with someone, both drink!
Truth booth! {player1} answers any question from each player honestly or takes a shot

Dictator! {player1} is in charge for 2 rounds. Their word is law!

Mini-game: WATERFALL! {player1} starts drinking. Next person starts when they start, can't stop until {player1} stops. Chain continues!
Mini-game: CATEGORIES! {player1} picks a topic. Go around - hesitate or repeat = take 5 sips!
Mini-game: NEVER HAVE I EVER! {player1} says something. Everyone who HAS done it takes 3 sips!
Mini-game: MOST LIKELY TO! Who's most likely to ghost someone? Point! Person with most fingers takes that many sips!
Mini-game: RHYME TIME! {player1} says a word. Go around rhyming. Fail = 4 sips!
Mini-game: FLIP CUP! Losers take 6 sips each
Mini-game: KINGS! Draw an imaginary card. Ace = waterfall, 2 = you, 3 = me, 4 = floor, 5 = guys, 6 = chicks, 7 = heaven, 8 = mate, 9 = rhyme, 10 = categories!
